ClassDef.Name: RayResult

Properties.Name: Origin
Properties.Description: The origin point of the ray.

Properties.Name: Direction
Properties.Description: The direction vector of the ray.

Properties.Name: Position
Properties.Description: The position where the ray hit an object.

Properties.Name: Normal
Properties.Description: The surface normal at the point where the ray hit.

Properties.Name: Distance
Properties.Description: The distance from the ray's origin to the hit point.

Properties.Name: Instance
Properties.Description: The instance that was hit by the ray.

ClassDef.Description: RayResult is a data type that contains data about a raycast result.
